Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29404 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.22.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29404 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.22.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.22.6-1, affected by CVE-2023-29404
